Siyong Ma

Hi, my name is Siyong Ma, and now a Master candidate in Computer Science graduate program of Northeastern University, Boston, MA. I earned my B.Engineering degree in Software Engineering from Software Engineering Institute of East China Normal University, July, 2013.

I am looking for 2014 summer internship and COOP intern opportunity for Spring 2015.

About me

I am a good learner, and eager to participate in industry based research or work. I am familiar with Python, Java, and C++. I am currently taking some interesting MOOC online courses on edx.org. Besides taking Algorithm courses at Northeastern University, I also audit 6.006 & 6.046 at MIT.
